name: Viking Juego: Tay's Destiny
description:
This is a game I made in RPG Maker MV about my friends groups many hypotheticals. This game is about 30 mins in length, If you enjoy the game please support me by donating.

The game itself takes place in an alternate universe in 2011. The main protagonist, Tay, is an entrepreneur in many fields: Game-Dev, Aerospace Engineer, Space Hotel, AI Engineer, Space-X Shill, and more. Will you join him on his epic adventure.
